**Step 4**: After filling out the enrollment form, the beneficiary has to submit the form to the concerned persons in Anganwadis Centre. 
**Step 5:** After successful enrollment, the beneficiary may get the benefits of the scheme. 
**Note:** The beneficiaries are provided a monthly quota of supplementary nutrition as a take-home ration on a fixed day of every month.

The scheme builds on the Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) being implemented by the government of India.
